note: Lifelong writer and musician raised by Bohemians and engineers with one foot in technology and the other in the arts. Living in LA after a long stretch in San Francisco and Silicon Valley and intense sojourns in Paris and New York. Love my kids, my dogs, my guitars, my bike, and quite possibly you and will defend our biosphere to the last breath. Passionately favor democracy, justice, science, art. Climate, people! If I have a spirit animal, it's probably Groucho Marx.
